project.name: Documentation
project.description: Maintenance and enhancement of PPC specific Documentation
project.longdescription: Updating and Creating documentation for the Gentoo/PPC team especially the Installation Guide and the Gentoo PPC FAQ. As the Gentoo Handbook becomes the "official" installation guide, we concentrate our work more and more on this document.

task.name: maintenance
task.longdescription: As Gentoo and Apple doesn't stop to invent new things, the documentation have to be altered and keep the answers to recent questions, guide through the installation and help the user to work with Gentoo more easily.

task.name: handbook
task.longdescription: The Gentoo Handbook will become soon the "official" documentation. The PPC-specific steps have to be written and verified.
